    Frank Chen (陈伉)

    I am a Program Manager in the Telemetry & Analytics team at Microsoft, and a part-time Masters student in Data Science at University of Washington. I draw, read, and take photos from time to time.

    Previously:

    • B.S. in Computer Science from UCLA
    • Researcher at VCLA with Nishant Shukla and Prof. Song-Chun Zhu
    • Organizer at LA Hacks
    • Resident Assistant for UCLA ResLife
    • I also lectured a course on Cybersecurity
